meanings.sent1: She made the dopiest mistake by putting salt instead of sugar in the cake batter.

meanings.sent3: The dopiest thing I did today was try to unlock the door with my car keys.
meanings.sent4: His dopiest move was believing he could fly after watching a superhero movie.

meanings.definition: Showing a lack of intelligence or common sense
meanings.sent1: The dopiest student in the class always forgets to bring a pencil to school.
meanings.sent2: It was the dopiest idea to try and fix the broken vase with tape.
meanings.sent3: She had the dopiest expression on her face when she realized she was wearing mismatched shoes.
meanings.sent4: His dopiest moment was when he tried to microwave metal.
meanings.sent5: The dopiest choice he made was to pet a stray dog without knowing if it was friendly.
